name: EasyWord Big Document
summary: Learn about .BOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: EasyOffice is no longer developed and has been replaced by the ONE Office Suite.

description: Document saved with EasyWord, the word processor included with the EasyOffice office suite; used for saving large files created with EasyWord; can also be exported to a .DOC file, which can be opened by Microsoft Word.
